alert.note: Alert for Little Belt and Highwood Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 27 at 1:37AM MDT until April 27 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THIS MORNING TO 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations up to 6 inches, with locally higher amounts possible on mountain peaks. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Little Belt and Highwood Mountains. * WHEN...From 6 AM this morning to 9 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult, especially over Kings Hill Pass. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The period of heaviest snowfall is expected from 6 AM through noon, with snow gradually decreasing in intensity through the 3 PM to 9 PM timeframe.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.
